radiographic_examinations.findings: Numerous layering stones are seen within the gallbladder which is partially distended but without evidence of pericholecystic fluid or gallbladder wall edema. The liver shows no evidence of focal lesions or textural abnormality. The main portal vein is patent. There is no evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation. The CBD measures up to 4 mm. The spleen measures 9 cm and has a homogeneous echotexture. The pancreas is unremarkable. The right kidney is normal.
